channel.title: A tag?
channel.description:
Hey, can anyone possibly fix up a TAG I can use? (Y'know, something that you spray paint/stick in various places as your sign..)
Something possibly simplistic, not really anything hardcore GFX because I'll either be spraypainting it or sticking it on a sticker or something stupid..
Text: Zex (or ZexCo, or Zexy) Involves.. something Parkour (free running), google it up/youtube it if you have no clue.
Thanks MATES.
edit: possibly even make it look "sketched", or if you're an actual artist, sketch it/scan it/upload it. May be a lot of work and include creative thinking, but hopefully someone can do it... I'll invite you to a torrent site.

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:18, topic:205273”]cowie/davidude have the right idea in what I’m looking for towards painting/sketching. Though, I think that would be a tag kinda thing rather than something I could paint.

;o[/quote]
Sorry, what did you want again? I thought you’d want a stencil outline thing, I mean that would be the best option for what you want I think. Just hold up stencil to wall, spray paint it then remove.
?

Read full topic

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:12, topic:205273”]

This is a little example really, not supposed to be a finished product or anything. If someone would care to edit in a better font, I know the one I chose was really shitty, and the “Z” sucks.

I know I suck at Photoshop so don’t begin to tell me =]. Just made this for other people to work off because I think it would be a pretty good tag once it has a good font.

Credits: Cowie` obviously for making the picture of the running/jumping guy.

I don’t know where/how to upload the .pdf so if anyone wants it then tell me where to upload and I will![/quote]

you just stole cowies and used the paint bucket…

Read full topic

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I have no idea what direction you want to go in exactly, so I just drew up a quick sketch in paint. It’s kind of what I was thinking I wanted it to look like, but that’s a bad representation on what it should look like in my eyes. If you have something totally different in mind, I’d be happy to go your route.

I wasn’t sure about the ‘co.’ part. I don’t know if you’d like the period or not either. I kind of didn’t see the color scheme you had in mind, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

@ThAt0n36Uy, Okay, for the spraying design, it should be simplistic, nothing too graphical. Maybe just a textual design, d’ya know what I mean?

@Kaza, That’d be cool. Though preferably I’d like something ‘vector-looking’.
Colour scheme: green/black/white
Other details I’ll have to post later.

@both, PM me your MSN e-mails so we can keep in touch.

BTW, thanks a ton for this.

Read full topic

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I’ll do it, but do you want it to be like a stencil? So you can spray it?

Read full topic

item.title: A tag?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I have this old Parkour sig i made, it’s a sig + avatar, nothing you could spray, but if you wanted them, you use them…

You might want to include size, like, measure the size of the stickers you’d be using, and a colour scheme, because photoshop can use of colors, and you might have only 3 cans or whatever.

Post if you want the sig + avatar, and ill get to it.

Read full topic
